attributes.action: allow crimes against unborn children to be recognised.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After 3 months the baby in the womb is no longer a foetus.You cannot have an abortion after 3 months because the baby is living.Some may agree this is murder.As experienced by myself and family,an unborn child of 7 months was killed due to the carelessness of a driver and nothing was done because nothing in british law gives the unborn child any rights. This needs to be changed.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "allow crimes against unborn children to be recognised."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13389.asp

Prime Minister's Office
